name: Shelfy Team (Startup)
description: We are a young team working on a platform for discovering, tracking, and managing information about multimedia products such as games, movies, series, and books. Our goal is to create a user-friendly tool that enables users to keep track of the content theyâ€™ve watched, read, or completed, discover new products through personalized recommendations, and interact with friends via social features (activity feed, friend system, collaborative product selection, etc.).
